title: Knife, ca. 1720
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Sabre-shaped blade with curved upper edge. Plain bolster, silver engraved ferrule with scalloped border. Flaring, faceted agate handle, silver conical mount on top.

tombstone.epitaph:
Knife, ca. 1720.
ca. 1720. agate, silver, steel. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-129.
